Title: The reputation of revolutionary heroes will last for posterity, all people have the greatest respect for the families of army men
Publisher: Yunnan renmin chubanshe (云南人民出版社)
Notes: The soldier on the left of this door poster holds a placard with the text "Good news of meritorious deeds" (立功喜报); the placard behind the old woman on the right reads "Glorious home" (光荣之家).
Theme: Door Gods (门神)People's Liberation ArmyThe Elderly
